terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.welcome: Welcome to Your Daily Compass. By using this application, you agree to the following terms:

sections.personalUseBody: The app is designed for personal use. You are responsible for the content you add (tasks, notes, goals, etc.).
sections.accountBody: You must provide accurate information when creating your account. You are solely responsible for keeping your credentials confidential.
sections.contentDeletionBody: You can edit or delete your data at any time from the app. We may remove any inactive account or account violating our rules.
sections.limitationsBody: We do our best to ensure service availability, but we cannot guarantee the absence of errors or interruptions.

sections.collectedDataBody: We only collect the data necessary for the proper functioning of the app: account information (username, email, phone number), content created in the app (tasks, goals, etc.), and anonymous usage data (crash reports, performance).
sections.dataUsageBody: Your data is used to save your information, synchronize your account, enhance app features, and provide a better user experience.
sections.dataSharingBody: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties unless legally required.
sections.securityBody: Your information is securely stored. We use Firebase for authentication and storage.
sections.yourRightsBody: You may request deletion of your data or account deactivation at any time through the 'Contact' section of the app.
